Reflective Optimization

Enhancing scheduling decisions with LLMâ€‘guided tradeâ€‘off reasoning.

Overview

This project explores the intersection of Large Language Models and optimization algorithms to create more intelligent scheduling systems. By incorporating reflective reasoning capabilities, we can make more nuanced trade-off decisions in complex scheduling scenarios.

Status

In submission to NeurIPS 2025

Authors

A. Jovine, P. Frazier, D. Shmoys, T. Ye
